predicate.note: Frames file for 'skipper' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 29.8.

example.name: not a boat
example.text: But spokesmen for both Mr. Isler and Mr. Conner say the formation of the new syndicate has to do with Mr. Isler's desire [*] to skipper his own team and begin planning now, rather than any falling out between the two sportsmen.
